title: Wicked Witch: a Retelling of The Wizard of Oz
description: There's something wicked in the Land of Oz...And it's none other than Allara Silverwood. Cast out of the Sisterhood of the Good Witches for accidentally committing a terrible crime, the former Good Witch of the West becomes the most hated person in the realm. If that's not bad enough, the love of her life mysteriously disappears. Looking for him proves difficult when her skin starts turning green and with the king's army hunting her down.With darkness conquering her soul, the Wicked Witch of the West does whatever she can to hang onto the goodness inside her. But how can she remain good when the one responsible for making her wicked refuses to let her go? Can Allara save herself, her man, and all of Oz before the evil completely consumes her?
author: Dee J. Stone
